titles: A declaration of the Committee for the Militia concerning the penalties that are to be inflicted upon those of the trained-bands that exempt themselves in this present expedition : together with a declaration of the Commons assembled in Parliament for the raising of money, plate, and horse to be imployed for the aid and assistance of the Lord Fairfax.
author: Committee for the Militia of London.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Sources.
